author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Eight! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.
In the DNA of Tabletop Gamers there are two divergent genetic lines that often butt heads; those that believe Orcs are the coolest and those that believe Dwarfs are the coolest. These gamers can often be found scrapping, drinking and throwing things at each other. This game was clearly written by the latter, for the latter. Let's dive in!

Check out the Rulebook HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/476035/Torch--Shield?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 038 - TORCH & SHIELD by GRIMSKALD

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Having played the Starter Missions in the new box, Bob and I hop onto Army Forge to tweak our forces and play the Standard mission from the One Page Rules Grimdark Future ruleset at 1750pts. 

The Retail-Packaged 2-Player Starter set with 77 models, terrain, game mat, tokens and dice from One Page Rules is going up later this month for pre-order on Gamefound and I was lucky enough to get sent a prototype to try out! Bob and I have painted up the Robot Legions and Saurian Starhost to play through the boxed set. 

Get notified on Gamefound HERE:https://gamefound.com/en/projects/onepagerules/grimdark-future-battle-box

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://w
title: Grimdark Future: BROKEN TRUTH Battle Report - Robot Legions vs. Saurian Starhost
